channel.title: [RESOLVED - DENIED] Once again: merge moparisthebest with moparscape
channel.description:
coming off of my other topic and an age old debate: [b]Once again: merge moparisthebest with moparscape[/b]
Only stipulation: use the moparisthebest domain name, redirect moparscape to it.

item.title: [RESOLVED - DENIED] Once again: merge moparisthebest with moparscape
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

We’ve reached a verdict on this a few times now, each time it has been no. I think there has been time enough to explore this idea in its entirety.

Read full topic

item.title: [RESOLVED - DENIED] Once again: merge moparisthebest with moparscape
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

Yeah, good lord mitb is dead. I just checked over there and there is only like 3 new posts on the 6th.

I believe that we shouldn’t be asking why consolidate them if they contain the same board, but rather why not. Why have two of the same thing? Especially if one is hardly ever used.

I also concur with Bowser with merging GameDev and MoparCraft. I believe the splitting the community into different websites is not the solution, as it limits the exposure, as it has been repeatedly in the other thread. If there is a section and even if it isn’t as widely used as Server Help, perhaps others will get interested into it. That is how I got interested into making models. I saw the section labeled RS Models and I wondered what it entailed. Creating a separate forum for GameDev has split the community in the same sense as splitting MoparScape from MITB. I hardly ever go to GameDev although it is a very interesting forum. I just can’t be bothered to have two tabs open and am not interested in making games. However, I do find game development interesting, just not enough to be browsing two forums at once. I believe that unity is always a better solution than segregation as it pools a larger user base together and creates a larger pool of ideas and minds.

I also concur with t4’s stipulation as mitb was here first and it should be that domain.

Read full topic
item.source: [RESOLVED - DENIED] Once again: merge moparisthebest with moparscape

newsflash2: it’s dead

item.title: [RESOLVED - DENIED] Once again: merge moparisthebest with moparscape
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

[quote=“sinisoul, post:15, topic:518458”][quote author=t4 link=topic=636724.msg4293634#msg4293634 date=1367807021]

Again, I fail to see the purpose. MoparScape has an equivalent board for all of the Moparisthebest.com ones, that site isn’t super-active as of right now, and every single member on there knows about MoparScape and can post on here if they want to. Merging wouldn’t give either site any advantage, so what’s the point?

There’s no section of rs client hacking on this side for one
[/quote]

If it was here would it even be popular anyway considering the current makeup of the forum userbase? I doubt it.[/quote]
could attract new people or at least get people interested in it

Read full topic

item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

Regardless of how dead moparisthebest.com is we won’t be merging with it. We’ll just come to the same conclusion as before and it’ll be left at that, I personally would like to see a merge but it won’t happen.

Read full topic
item.source: [RESOLVED - DENIED] Once again: merge moparisthebest with moparscape

item.title: [RESOLVED - DENIED] Once again: merge moparisthebest with moparscape
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

[quote=“Tom, post:7, topic:518458”]Just worth pointing out the previous conclusion:

This has been a massively discussed topic. We have spent many hours going over what to do about this idea. The consensus between what we came up with and what the rest of the administration decided is before your eyes on the board index. There are more infrastructure changes planned besides what was implemented with the boards, so expect a few more possible changes.

As to a full merge, that has been decided against and will not happen. Moparisthebest and MoparScape are simply considered separate communities in every way possible, minus the shared accounts. That is how it will be for now on. If you want private server development, you go here. If you want RuneScape hacking, you go to Moparisthebest.com.

This topic is resolved.

While I’m fine with keeping this discussion open, I doubt much will change from the previous 14 page topic.[/quote]
Sure, but considering mitb is dead…

Read full topic
item.source: [RESOLVED - DENIED] Once again: merge moparisthebest with moparscape

item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Just worth pointing out the previous conclusion:

[quote=“Taharok, post:277, topic:445369”]This has been a massively discussed topic. We have spent many hours going over what to do about this idea. The consensus between what we came up with and what the rest of the administration decided is before your eyes on the board index. There are more infrastructure changes planned besides what was implemented with the boards, so expect a few more possible changes.

As to a full merge, that has been decided against and will not happen. Moparisthebest and MoparScape are simply considered separate communities in every way possible, minus the shared accounts. That is how it will be for now on. If you want private server development, you go here. If you want RuneScape hacking, you go to Moparisthebest.com.

This topic is resolved.[/quote]

While I’m fine with keeping this discussion open, I doubt much will change from the previous 14 page topic.

Read full topic

item.title: [RESOLVED - DENIED] Once again: merge moparisthebest with moparscape
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

[quote=“t4, post:4, topic:518458”][quote author=TabbyKiller link=topic=636724.msg4292772#msg4292772 date=1367628047]
Just leave it there as ruins, for tourist to see. It’s not hurting anyone.
[/quote]

Just to make it clear: merging does no harm (community clashing), it consolidates the two boards adding new sections and information in one place, and it expands the topics that can be made, potentially enhancing the userbase.[/quote]
Well yeah for sure it wont do harm considering there are no more mitb users left over there. But to go as far as enhancing, it would only add a few more boards about cars and a programming language no one here will ever know (scar).

Read full topic

@Vain1 wrote:

this is directed towards you and all others who supported similar claims in the other topic

instead of saying do it perhaps supply a mockup of all categories/boards that would be on the one site. this way the staff can see whether it be too cluttered or not; as well as other users can help you broaden/narrow the categories/boards.

as for my opinion on the matter, i could care less whether it be on one site or four-hundred.
